caption: This photograph displays a silhouette of two large, heavy construction vehicles against a soft, light sky. The vehicles are positioned on an elevated mound, outlined sharply against the light backdrop. The first vehicle on the left appears to be equipped with a large, curved protective frame possibly suggesting it is a loader or another type of heavy-duty equipment designed for rugged tasks. The second vehicle, right of the first, shows a similar profile with a slightly different build, potentially another type of heavy construction or earth-moving equipment. The sky in the background has a gradient of light grayish-blue tones, providing a serene contrast to the dark, bold shapes of the machinery. The overall composition emphasizes the machinery's robustness and the industrial nature of the scene, set against the backdrop of a calm sky.
title: Construction equipment at the site of the new railroad which will transport coal from the Westmoreland Coal Company.
